Message: Fix for multiple AppDomains in the same process (classic RFC)
Add logic to support OData query options $top, $skip and $count.
More details in log when resending failed calls while using the debug details switched on
The applied filters are reflected in the MDX dialog (in earlier versions the filters were ignored)
"Uncheck All" button available in members filter dialog
The parent entries of the selected members in the members filter dialog are now highlighted in blue
